news.title: Korean Augmentation to the US Army (KR)

projects.title: Rise of Streaming Platforms
projects.authors: Sung Joon Park, Mooyoung Lee, Brishti Saha, Gayoung Lee
projects.desc: With Netflix, Disney+ and various streaming platforms rising, it is crucial for big companies to get a sense of what movies and shows people are interested in so that they can retain their users.This would also benefit the users since they would be able to access their favorite shows on the streaming platforms, being able to escape from any emotional stress caused at this time of uncertainty. Through our project, we hope to provide meaningful information and trends regarding films on multiple streaming platforms for the companies as well as the consumers.

projects.title: Machine Learning for Determining Tennis Court Conditions
projects.desc: Researching under Professor Kim at Korea University, I organized and managed a project that automatically determines likelihood to play tennis by discerning condition of a clay tennis court. The steps to construct a structure to automate this process, I collected images of tennis court in same angle through installed IP Camera, made two datasets: 'CAN' and 'CANNOT',and built a structure. The structure was constructed in order to learn from dataset, determine the status of the court, and derive the result. After learning from train directory, the model was tested by images from train directory and showed 70% of accuracy.
